analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavatyai ārya graha mātṛkāyai

original: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān aḍakavatyāṃ mahānagaryām anekadevanāgayakṣarākṣasagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāpasmārādityasomāṅgārabudhabṛhaspatiśukraśaniścararāhuketvādibhiś
analyzed: evam mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān aḍakavatyām mahā nagaryām aneka deva nāga yakṣa rākṣasa gandharva asura garuḍa kinnara mahoraga apasmāra āditya soma aṅgāra budha bṛhaspati śukra śaniścara rāhu ketu ādibhiḥ
ca aṣṭāviṃśati nakṣatra ādibhiḥ stūyamānaḥ mahā vajra samaya alaṅkāra vyūha adhiṣṭhāna dhiṣṭhite

original: tadyathā - vajrapāṇinā ca nāma bodhisattvena mahāsattvena /
analyzed: tat yathā vajrapāṇinā ca nāma bodhisattvena mahāsattvena

original: evaṃ pramukhair bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ śatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto bhagavān dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
analyzed: evam pramukhaiḥ bodhisattvaiḥ mahāsattvaiḥ śata sahasraiḥ sārdham parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ bhagavān dharmam deśayati sma

original: ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ (Gmdh 172)
analyzed: ādau kalyāṇam madhye kalyāṇam paryavasāne kalyāṇam su artham

original: suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaparyavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati sma /
analyzed: su vyañjanam kevalam paripūrṇam pariśuddha paryavadātam brahmacaryam saṃprakāśayati sma

original: atha khalu vajrapāṇir bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tat parṣanmaṇḍalam avalokyāsanād utthāya
analyzed: atha khalu vajrapāṇiḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ tat parṣad maṇḍalam avalokya āsanāt utthāya

original: svaṛddhyādhiṣṭhānena bhagavantam anekaśatasahasraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya praṇamya purato
analyzed: sva ṛddhyā adhiṣṭhānena bhagavantam aneka śata sahasram pradakṣiṇīkṛtya praṇamya puratas

original: niṣadya sagarveṇa paryaṅkam ābhujya līlayā tat parṣanmaṇḍalam avalokya vajrāñjalī
analyzed: niṣadya sa garveṇa paryaṅkam ābhujya līlayā tat parṣad maṇḍalam avalokya vajra añjalī
sva hṛdaye pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavantam etat avocat

original: grahāś ca bhagavann ugrānugrarūpāś ca raudrāraudrarūpās ca krūrākrūrarūpāś ca sattvān viheṭhayanti /
analyzed: grahāḥ ca bhagavan ugra anugra rūpāḥ ca raudra a raudra rūpāḥ ca krūra akrūra rūpāḥ ca sattvān viheṭhayanti

original: keṣāñcit prāṇam apaharanti keṣāñcid upadravāś ca kurvanti keṣāñcid ojohārāṃś ca kurvanti keṣāñcid dravyam apaharanti keṣāñcid dīrghāyuṣsattvānām  #
analyzed: keṣāñcid prāṇam apaharanti keṣāñcid upadravāḥ ca kurvanti keṣāñcid ojaḥ hārān ca kurvanti keṣāñcid dravyam apaharanti keṣāñcid dīrgha āyuḥ sattvānām

original: tad deśayatu bhagavan dharmaparyāyaṃ yena sarvasattvānāṃ sarvopadravebhyo rakṣā bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: tat deśayatu bhagavan dharmaparyāyam yena sarva sattvānām sarva upadravebhyaḥ rakṣā bhaviṣyati

original: bhagavān āha - sādhu sādhu vajrapāṇe yas tvaṃ sarvasattvānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya kṛpācittam utpādya mahāguhyātiguhyataraṃ tathāgataṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ  #
analyzed: bhagavān āha sādhu sādhu vajrapāṇe yaḥ tvam sarva sattvānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya kṛpā cittam utpādya mahā guhya ati guhyataram tathāgatam samyaksaṃbuddham

original: tac chṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te /
analyzed: tat śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru bhāṣiṣye ham te

original: grahāṇām ugrarūpāṇāṃ krūrātibhīṣaṇamukhānāṃ mahāguhyātiguhyataraṃ divyapūjām arghaṃ ca jāpañ ca dhūpañ ca -
analyzed: grahāṇām ugra rūpāṇām krūra ati bhīṣaṇa mukhānām mahā guhya ati guhyataram divya pūjām argham ca jāpam ca dhūpam ca
yathā anuvarṇa bhedena yathā tuṣyanti te grahāḥ

original: devāś cāpy asurāś caiva kinnarāś ca mahoragāḥ /
analyzed: devāḥ ca api asurāḥ ca eva kinnarāḥ ca mahoragāḥ

original: yakṣāś ca rākṣasāś caiva manuṣāś caivāmānuṣāḥ // 2 //
analyzed: yakṣāḥ ca rākṣasāḥ ca eva manuṣāḥ ca eva amānuṣāḥ

original: śamayanti ca kruddhāś ca mahānugrāś ca tejasā /
analyzed: śamayanti ca kruddhāḥ ca mahānugrāḥ ca tejasā

original: pūjāṃ teṣāṃ pravakṣāmi mantrāṃś cāpi yathākramam* // 3 //
analyzed: pūjām teṣām pravakṣāmi mantrān ca api yathākramam

original: atha khalu bhagavāñ chākyamuniḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ svahṛdayāt karuṇāvikrīḍitaṃ nāma raśmijvālaṃ niścārya grahāṇāṃ mūrdhni praveśayati sma /
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavām śākyamuniḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sva hṛdayāt karuṇāvikrīḍitam nāma raśmi jvālam niścārya grahāṇām mūrdhni praveśayati sma

original: atha tatkṣaṇād eva te sarve ādityādayo grahā utthāya bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam
analyzed: atha tad kṣaṇāt eva te sarve āditya ādayaḥ grahāḥ utthāya bhagavantam śākyamunim tathāgatam

original: arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ sarvābhir divyapūjābhiḥ pūjayitvā praṇamya jānubhir nipatya
analyzed: arhantam samyaksaṃbuddham sarvābhiḥ divya pūjābhiḥ pūjayitvā praṇamya jānubhiḥ nipatya
kṛta añjali puṭāḥ bhūtvā bhagavantam etat avocan

original: anugṛhītā vayaṃ bhagavatā tathāgatenārhato samyaksaṃbuddhena tad deśayatu bhagavan tādṛśaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ yena vayaṃ sāmagrībhūtasya dharmabhāṇakasya  #
analyzed: anugṛhītāḥ vayam bhagavatā tathāgatena arhato samyaksaṃbuddhena tat deśayatu bhagavan tādṛśam dharmaparyāyam yena vayam sāmagrī bhūtasya dharma bhāṇakasya

original: guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhanaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ  #
analyzed: guptim paritrāṇam parigraham paripālanam śāntim svastyayanam daṇḍa parihāram śastra parihāram viṣa dūṣaṇam viṣa nāśanam sīmābandhanam dharaṇībandham

original: atha khalu bhagavāñ chākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho grahāṇāṃ mantrapūjāñ ca bhāṣate sma /
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavām śākyamuniḥ tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ grahāṇām mantra pūjām ca bhāṣate sma

original: yathānukramabhedena diśāś copadiśāś ca gandhamaṇḍalakaṃ padmamadhye dvādaśāṅgulapramāṇaṃ caturasraṃ caturdvāraṃ catustoraṇaśobhitaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ  #
analyzed: yathā anukrama bhedena diśāḥ ca upadiśāḥ ca gandha maṇḍalakam padma madhye dvādaśa aṅgula pramāṇam catur asram catur dvāram catur toraṇa śobhitam kūṭāgāram

original: tanmadhye sitakamalopari kuṅkumagandhamaṇḍalake cintayed devaṃ bhāskaraṃ tāpasarūpadharaṃ bhujābhyāṃ sitakamaladharaṃ raktavarṇaṃ sahasrasūryakoṭisamatejomālinaṃ  #
analyzed: tad madhye sita kamala upari kuṅkuma gandha maṇḍalake cintayet devam bhāskaram tāpasa rūpa dharam bhujābhyām sita kamala dharam rakta varṇam sahasra sūrya koṭi sama tejaḥ mālinam
asya deyam kṣīra bhojanam kunduru dhūpam

original: pūrvasyāṃ diśi raktakamalopari priyaṅgugandhamaṇḍalake somo brāhmaṇa iti jñeyaṃ sitavarṇaṃ jaṭāmukuṭapuṣpāvasaktaṃ bhojanaghṛtodanaṃ śrīvāsadhūpaḥ
analyzed: pūrvasyām diśi rakta kamala upari priyaṅgu gandha maṇḍalake somaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ iti jñeyam sita varṇam jaṭā mukuṭa puṣpa avasaktam bhojana ghṛta odanam śrīvāsa dhūpaḥ

original: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi śuklakamalopari candanagandhamaṇḍalake bhikṣurūpo maṅgalo raktavarṇo
analyzed: dakṣiṇasyām diśi śukla kamala upari candana gandha maṇḍalake bhikṣu rūpaḥ maṅgalaḥ rakta varṇaḥ

original: ratnamakuṭo vāme śakti dakṣiṇe varadahasto bhojanam asya kṣīrabhojanaṃ bhāṣabhaktaṃ vā gugguladhūpaḥ /
analyzed: ratna makuṭaḥ vāme śakti dakṣiṇe vara da hastaḥ bhojanam asya kṣīra bhojanam bhāṣa bhaktam vā guggula dhūpaḥ
om rakta aṅgāra sa ujjvala kumārāya namaḥ

original: paścimāyām diśi raktapadmopari kṛṣṇāgarugandhamaṇḍalake brahmacārī budhaḥ syāt pītavarṇo raktaśmaśruḥ akṣasūtrakamaṇḍaludharaḥ /
analyzed: paścimāyām diśi rakta padma upari kṛṣṇa agaru gandha maṇḍalake brahmacārī budhaḥ syāt pīta varṇaḥ rakta śmaśruḥ akṣa sūtra kamaṇḍalu dharaḥ
om rāja putra pīta varṇāya namaḥ

original: uttarasyāṃ diśi sitakamalopari devadārugandhamaṇḍalake parivrājako gurus taptakāñcanavarṇābho raktaśmaśruḥ akṣasūtrakamaṇḍaludharaḥ /
analyzed: uttarasyām diśi sita kamala upari devadāru gandha maṇḍalake parivrājakaḥ guruḥ tapta kāñcana varṇa ābhaḥ rakta śmaśruḥ akṣasūtra kamaṇḍalu dharaḥ
asya deyam dadhi bhakta odana kṣīram vā madhu dhṛta dhūpaḥ
om lohita varṇa nigamāya namaḥ bhoga āspadāya svāhā

original: āgneyāṃ diśi raktapadmopari candanagandhamaṇḍalake śukrapāśupatadhāri gokṣīravarṇadhavalāmbho jaṭāmukutākṣasūtrakamaṇḍaludharaḥ /
analyzed: āgneyām diśi rakta padma upari candana gandha maṇḍalake śukra pāśupata dhāri go kṣīra varṇa dhavala ambhaḥ jaṭā mukuta akṣasūtra kamaṇḍalu dharaḥ
asya deyam kṣīra bhojanam karpūra dhūpaḥ

original: oṃ namaḥ śukrādhipataye asurottamāya śuddhavigrahe svāhā /
analyzed: om namaḥ śukra adhipataye asura uttamāya śuddha vigrahe svāhā

original: nairṛtyāṃ diśi sitapaṅkajopari nīlacandanagandhamaṇḍalake śaniścaro kṛṣṇavarṇaphaṇabhṛtkṣapaṇako jñeyaḥ bījajaṭāmukuṭaśmaśruḥ /
analyzed: nairṛtyām diśi sita paṅkaja upari nīla candana gandha maṇḍalake śaniścaro kṛṣṇa varṇa phaṇa bhṛt kṣapaṇakaḥ jñeyaḥ bīja jaṭā mukuṭa śmaśruḥ
akṣasūtra kṣi kṣirikā dharaḥ bhojanam asya

original: vāyavyāṃ diśi raktāmbhojopari tagarādigandhamaṇḍalake kāpāliko rāhu rājāvartanibho
analyzed: vāyavyām diśi rakta ambhoja upari tagara ādi gandha maṇḍalake kāpālikaḥ
rdha dehaḥ ravi ratha bhayānaka locana yugaḥ daṃṣṭrā karālaḥ bhṛkuṭī kṛta lalāṭa pañca varṇaḥ
megha madhya gataḥ bhujābhyām candra sūrya kamala abhinaya sthitaḥ

original: asya deyaṃ bhāṣāmiṣabhojanaṃ tilakṛṣaro vā vilvapatradhūpaḥ /
analyzed: asya deyam bhāṣā āmiṣa bhojanam tila kṛṣaraḥ vā vilva patra dhūpaḥ
om vikṛta vadana rudhira āśin rāho bhṛṅga añjana sannibhāya namaḥ

original: aiśānyāṃ diśi raktasaroruhopari spṛkkāgandhamaṇḍalake cāṇḍālaketur bhavet* /
analyzed: aiśānyām diśi rakta saroruha upari spṛkkā gandha maṇḍalake cāṇḍāla ketuḥ bhavet

original: asya deyaṃ bhojanaṃ dhṛtapūrakaṃ sajjaraso dhūpaḥ /
analyzed: asya deyam bhojanam dhṛta pūrakam sajja rasaḥ dhūpaḥ
om dhūmra varṇa sannibhāya jyotiṣketave namaḥ svāhā

original: maṇḍalasya pūrvadvāre buddho bhagavān dakṣiṇadvāre vajrapāṇiḥ paścimadvāre lokanāthaḥ uttaradvāre mañjuśrīkumāraḥ /
analyzed: maṇḍalasya pūrva dvāre buddhaḥ bhagavān dakṣiṇa dvāre vajrapāṇiḥ paścima dvāre lokanāthaḥ uttara dvāre mañjuśrī kumāraḥ

original: pūrvottarakoṇe sarve grahāḥ pūrvadakṣiṇakoṇe sarve rāśinakṣatrāḥ dakṣiṇapaścimakoṇe sarvopadravāḥ paścimottarakoṇe bhaṭṭārikā mahāvidyā /
analyzed: pūrva uttara koṇe sarve grahāḥ pūrva dakṣiṇa koṇe sarve rāśi nakṣatrāḥ dakṣiṇa paścima koṇe sarva upadravāḥ paścima uttara koṇe bhaṭṭārikā mahāvidyā

original: śvetā nīlāruṇatrimukhā hastadvayena vyākhyānamudrā dakṣiṇe ratnachatrā vāme pāśaśaktidharā ratnamukuṭīvajraparyaṅkopaviṣṭā candāsanasamāsīnā  #
analyzed: śvetā nīla aruṇa tri mukhā hasta dvayena vyākhyāna mudrā dakṣiṇe ratna chatrā vāme pāśa śakti dharā ratna mukuṭī vajra paryaṅka upaviṣṭā candāsana samāsīnā
ṣoḍaśa varṣa ākārā sarva alaṅkāra bhūṣitā

original: bāhyapūrvadvāre dhṛtarāṣṭrasya dadhibhaktaṃ dakṣiṇe virūḍhakasya dadhimāṣabhaktaṃ paścime virūpākṣasya kṣīrabhatam uttare kuberasya dadhimāṣabhaktaṃ  #
analyzed: bāhya pūrva dvāre dhṛtarāṣṭrasya dadhi bhaktam dakṣiṇe virūḍhakasya dadhi māṣa bhaktam paścime virūpākṣasya kṣīra bhatam uttare kuberasya dadhi māṣa bhaktam
yathā anukrama bhedena puṣpa ādi pūjā kartavyā

original: dhṛtamadhubhyāṃ śaṃkhaṃ pūrayitvā pañcaratnaṃ prakṣipyārgho deyaḥ /
analyzed: dhṛta madhubhyām śaṃkham pūrayitvā pañcaratnam prakṣipya arghaḥ deyaḥ
evam varṇa bhuja āsana mudrā cihnāni bhavanti

original: oṃ namaḥ sarvatathāgatebhyaḥ sarvāśāparipūrakebhyaḥ sarvathā bhaktine svāhā /
analyzed: om namaḥ sarva tathāgatebhyaḥ sarva āśā paripūrakebhyaḥ sarvathā bhaktine svāhā

original: ratnatrayasya mantraṃ evaṃ pratyekaṃ japet saptasaptāṣṭaśataṃ mantram ekaikaśaḥ /
analyzed: ratnatrayasya mantram evam pratyekam japet sapta sapta aṣṭaśatam mantram ekaikaśas

original: evaṃ pūjitāḥ sarve grahā vividharūpiṇo dadati vipulān bhogān saubhāgyān* janayanty api /
analyzed: evam pūjitāḥ sarve grahāḥ vividha rūpiṇaḥ dadati vipulān bhogān saubhāgyān janayanti api

original: imāni vajrapāṇe navagrahāṇāṃ hṛdayāni paṭhitasiddhāni tathānukramabhedena gandhamaṇḍalakaṃ
analyzed: imāni vajrapāṇe nava grahāṇām hṛdayāni paṭhita siddhāni tathā anukrama bhedena gandha maṇḍalakam

original: kṛtvā dvādaśāṅgulimadhye pūjayitavyāni tāmramṛṇmayarūpyādibhojanena arghaṃ datvāṣṭottaraśatavārān
analyzed: kṛtvā dvādaśa aṅguli madhye pūjayitavyāni tāmra mṛṇmaya rūpya ādi bhojanena argham da tvā aṣṭottaraśata vārān

original: paścāt punar vajrapāṇe gṛhamātṛkānāma dhāraṇīmantrapadāni saptavārānuccārayitavyāni /
analyzed: paścāt punar vajrapāṇe gṛhamātṛkā nāma dhāraṇī mantra padāni sapta vārān uccārayitavyāni
tatas te āditya ādayaḥ rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim kariṣyanti

original: dāridryaṃ duḥkhaṃ mocayiṣyanti gatāyuṣaṃ dīrghāyuṣaṃ kariṣyanti /
analyzed: dāridryam duḥkham mocayiṣyanti gata āyuṣam dīrgha āyuṣam kariṣyanti

original: yaś ca khalu punar vajrapāṇe bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikān ye vā sattvajātīyā yeṣāṃ karṇapuṭe śabdaṃ nipatiṣyanti na teṣām akālamṛtyunā kālaṃ  #
analyzed: yaḥ ca khalu punar vajrapāṇe bhikṣu bhikṣuṇī upāsaka upāsikān ye vā sattva jātīyāḥ yeṣām karṇa puṭe śabdam nipatiṣyanti na teṣām akāla mṛtyunā kālam

original: yaś ca khalu punar vajrapāṇe grahān maṇḍalamadhye pūjayitvā dine dine saptavārānuccārayiṣyanti / tatra
analyzed: yaḥ ca khalu punar vajrapāṇe grahān maṇḍala madhye pūjayitvā dine dine sapta vārān uccārayiṣyanti tatra

original: tasya dharmabhāṇakasya sarve grahāḥ sarveṇa sarvāśāṃ paripūrayiṣyanti /
analyzed: tasya dharma bhāṇakasya sarve grahāḥ sarveṇa sarva āśām paripūrayiṣyanti
tad kulāt api dāridryam ca na āśāyiṣyanti

original: atha khalu bhagavāñ chākyamuni tathāgataḥ punar api gṛhamātṛkānāma dhāraṇīmantrapadāni bhāṣate sma /
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavām śākyamuni tathāgataḥ punar api gṛhamātṛkā nāma dhāraṇī mantra padāni bhāṣate sma
om namaḥ sarva grahāṇām sarva āśā paripūrakāṇām
om namaḥ sarva upadravāṇām tat yathā

original: oṃ buddhe 2 śuddhe 2 vajre 2 padme 2 sara 2 prasare 2 smara 2 krīḍa 2 krīḍaya 2 mara
analyzed: om buddhe śuddhe vajre padme sara prasare smara krīḍa krīḍaya mara

original: 2 māraya 2 mardaya 2 stambha 2 stambhaya 2 ghaṭa 2 ghāṭaya 2 mama sarvasattvānāñ
analyzed: māraya mardaya stambha stambhaya ghaṭa ghāṭaya mama sarva sattvānām

original: ca vighnān* chinda chinda bhinda 2 sarvavighnān nāśanaṃ kuru 2 mama saparivārasya
analyzed: ca vighnān chinda chinda bhinda sarva vighnān nāśanam kuru mama sa parivārasya

original: sarvasattvānāñ ca kāryaṃ kṣepaya 2 mama sarvasattvānāñ ca sarvanakṣatragrahapīḍān
analyzed: sarva sattvānām ca kāryam kṣepaya mama sarva sattvānām ca sarva nakṣatra graha pīḍān

original: nivāraya 2 bhagavati śriyaṃ kuru mahāmāyā prasādhaya sarvaduṣṭān nāśaya sarvapāpāni
analyzed: nivāraya bhagavati śriyam kuru mahāmāyā prasādhaya sarva duṣṭān nāśaya sarva pāpāni

original: mama saparivārasya sarvasattvānāñ ca rakṣa 2 vajre 2 caṇḍe 2 caṇḍini 2 nuru 2 musu
analyzed: mama sa parivārasya sarva sattvānām ca rakṣa vajre caṇḍe caṇḍini nuru musu

original: 2 mumu 2 muñca 2 havā have ugre ugratare pūraya bhagavati manorathaṃ mama sarvaparivārasya
analyzed: mumu muñca havā have ugre ugratare pūraya bhagavati manoratham mama sarva parivārasya
sarva sattvānām ca sarva tathāgata ādi sthāna adhiṣṭhite svāhā
om sarva vidye hūm phaṭ svāhā

original: imāni vajrapāṇe grahamātṛkānāma dhāraṇīmantrapadāni sarvasiddhikarāṇi ca /
analyzed: imāni vajrapāṇe graha mātṛkā nāma dhāraṇī mantra padāni sarva siddhi karāṇi ca

original: yac ca khalu punar vajrapāṇe imāni grahamātṛkānāma dhāraṇīmantrapadāni kārtikamāsaśuklapakṣasya
analyzed: yat ca khalu punar vajrapāṇe imāni graha mātṛkā nāma dhāraṇī mantra padāni kārtika māsa śukla pakṣasya

original: saptamīm ārabhyopoṣadhiko bhūtvā yāvac caturdaśīgrahanakṣatrān madhye pūjayitvā dine
analyzed: saptamīm ārabhya upoṣadhikaḥ bhūtvā yāvat caturdaśī graha nakṣatrāt madhye pūjayitvā dine
tasya nava navati varṣāṇi mṛtyu bhayam na bhaviṣyati
ulkā pāta graha nakṣatra pīḍā bhayam na bhaviṣyati

original: atha te sarve grahāḥ sādhu bhagavann iti kṛtvā praṇamyāntarhitābhūvann iti /
analyzed: atha te sarve grahāḥ sādhu bhagavan iti kṛtvā praṇamya antarhitāḥ abhūvan iti

original: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te ca bhikṣavas te ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatīparṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko  #
analyzed: idam avocat bhagavān ātta manāḥ te ca bhikṣavaḥ te ca bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣad sa deva mānuṣa asura garuḍa gandharvaḥ ca
ārya graha mātṛkā nāma dhāraṇī samāptā
